title: i'm being hacked
body:
i need help, my account got hacked into, somehow i got a email saying "i requested a password change" which isn't true and all of a sudden i couldn't login anymore! I was able to request a password change and got my account back for now i think but i don't know what to do now to be sure i'm safe! 

please help.

replies.body:
It's good to hear that you got it back, but just to be safe, I suggest opening a [**Recovery Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) with Support. Better to be safe and make sure the account can't be accessed anymore!

Also, if you think it'd help out, go ahead and look through the tips we have [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to keep your account safe and protected! That's the top priority here. :)
i opened a support case giving a heads up! Hopefully this will be enough!
Hey It just happened to me to, i got an email that said i requested a password change and that's definitely not true. I was able to request another one though and got my account back.
IT just happened to me with my Main account !!!!!!!
But i dont have access to the email linked to that account anymore :(
that's very weird there must be some tool these people are using to get random accounts!!
I dont know man, but im very frustrated, i hope i can get my account back with the support helps -_-
